metadata.title: CVE-2018-7566 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The Linux kernel 4.15 has a Buffer Overflow via anSNDRV_SEQ_IOCTL_SET_CLIENT_POOL ioctl write operation to /dev/snd/seq by alocal user.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7566` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-13-generic - 4.15.0-13.14
linux-image-4.15.0-13-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-13.14
linux-image-4.15.0-13-lowlatency - 4.15.0-13.14
linux-image-extra-4.15.0-13-generic - 4.15.0-13.14
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1006-raspi2 - 4.15.0-1006.7
No subscription required

No subscription required
